title: Wi-Fi Issue after Android Q update
content:
I have Pixel 2 XL, yesterday updated my phone to latest Android Q stable release over the air update. Everything is working fine now just WiFi is acting weird it's not catching good signals even I am sitting couple of feet away from WiFi device. Kindly help me in this regard have already done FDR.

Here I was sitting 3 to 5 feet away from WiFi device.
Here I was sitting 10 to 12 feet away from Wi-Fi device.
